description:
There’s no good reason to have a dull axe. A sharper axe is a better tool, it bites deeper, releases easier and takes less effort per chop. Use this axe stone to do the trick.

  • 2 different grits. 240 (coarse) helps you take out nicks or chips, 400 (medium) helps smooth out and refine your edge
  • Compact so it's easy to keep with you
  • Puck style is surprisingly simple to use
  • Can be used wet (water or oil) or dry
name: Knife  & Axe Axe Stone
